name: Hoppy frog (Mr. Slitherz)
description: Hoppy Frog is a game where you get frogs to the right collored spaces, you can either reverse the starting pattern or sort from green to red, but the starting pattern and ammount of each color of frog is random every time, so while there arent technically levels, there are also over 1000 possible puzzles, so if you get a repeat itll feel like new. click a frog to send it to the open space, as long as the frog wont need to jump over more than 3 other frogs to get there, and make sure every space is filled with the same collored frog to win!
